detectors.description:
SafeMath.subtract(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Alarm.sol#64-71) has assert violation
	Assert violations:
	- assert(bool)(y <= x) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Alarm.sol#69)

Alarm.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Alarm.sol#155-161) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[from] = balances[from].subtract(tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Alarm.sol#156)
	- balances[to] = balances[to].add(tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Alarm.sol#158)
detectors.markdown:

	- [balances[to] = balances[to].add(tokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Alarm.sol#L158)

detectors.description: Variable Alarm._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Alarm.sol#116) is not in mixedCase

detectors.description:
allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Alarm.sol#22-25)
	- Alarm.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Alarm.sol#135-137)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Alarm.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Alarm.sol#145-149)
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Alarm.sol#27-29)

totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- Alarm.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Alarm.sol#131-133)
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Alarm.sol#31-34)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Alarm.sol#36-39)
	- Alarm.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Alarm.sol#151-153)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Alarm.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Alarm.sol#164-180)
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Alarm.sol#41-43)
